column1: Congrats to Chairman @tomemmer and thank you for leading @NRCC as we work hard to regain the Majority and deliver results for the American people.

Congratulations to Rep-Elect @BurgessOwens on a well-earned victory in #UT04. In Congress he will fight for the people of Utah and our nation. I'm looking forward to serving together in the 117th Congress.

Congratulations to Rep-Elect @FischbachMN7 on a well-earned victory in #MN07. In Congress she will be a fighter for the people of Minnesota and our nation. I'm looking forward to working together in the 117th Congress.

Congratulations to Rep-Elect @CarlosGimenezFL on a well-earned victory in FL-26. In Congress he will fight for the people of Florida and our nation. I'm looking forward to working together in the 117th Congress.

Congratulations to Rep-Elect Jerry @CarlForAlabama on a well-earned victory in AL-01. He will be an incredible advocate for the people of Alabama and our nation. I'm looking forward to working with him in the 117th Congress.

Congratulations to Rep-Elect @MichelleSteelCA on a well-earned victory in CA-48. She will be a dedicated fighter for the people of California and our nation. I'm looking forward to working with her in the 117th Congress.

Congratulations to Rep-Elect @NancyMace on a well-earned victory in SC-01. She will be an incredible advocate for the people of South Carolina and our nation. I'm looking forward to working with her in the 117th Congress.
Congratulations to Rep-Elect @SheriffTNehls on a well-earned victory in TX-22. He will be a fighter for Texans and our nation and I'm looking forward to working with him in the 117th Congress.

Congratulations to Rep-Elect @YoungKimCA on a well-earned victory in CA-39. She will be an incredible advocate for Californians and the American people and I'm looking forward to working with her in the 117th Congress.
Congratulations to Rep-Elect @MaElviraSalazar on a well-earned victory in FL-27. I'm looking forward to working with her in the 117th Congress.
Congratulations to Rep-Elect @stephaniebice on a well-earned victory in OK-5. I'm looking forward to working with her in the 117th Congress.
Congratulations to Rep-Elect @TonyGonzales4TX on a well-earned victory in TX-23. I'm looking forward to working with him in the 117th Congress.
Congratulations to Rep-Elect @Bethvanduyne on a well-earned victory in TX-24. I'm looking forward to working with her in the 117th Congress.
Congratulations to Rep-Elect @NMalliotakis on a well-earned victory in NY-11. I'm looking forward to working with her in the 117th Congress.

Congratulations to Westmoreland County’s PA @SenatorKimWard on her historic election to serve as PA state Senate Majority Leader. She will be a tremendous leader for our Commonwealth. https://t.co/Z1SlTmKhVc
Pennsylvanians and the American people deserve a fair free safe secure and legitimate election. We must have a transparent process. Every LEGAL ballot should be counted.
Congratulations to @TimothyLDeFoor on his well-earned victory. In Harrisburg he'll stand up for PA taxpayers and keep the Wolf Administration accountable to Pennsylvanians.

Congratulations to my friend and neighbor Rep. Scott Perry (@PatriotsPerry) on a well-earned victory in #PA10. Looking forward to our continued work together to deliver results for the Commonwealth and our nation.

Fair free and legitimate elections are a hallmark of American democracy.   Help to stop voter suppression irregularities and fraud. If you have a case to report visit https://t.co/d5TKYvbPaB or call (888) 630-1776.

Rep. @EliseStefanik is an incredible leader fighting hard to elect outstanding Republican women across the country. I was proud to support #EPAC candidates and am looking forward to working with our new colleagues in the House. 🇺🇸 https://t.co/4pI2dh9zsH

President @realDonaldTrump and VP @Mike_Pence have delivered on their promises to Pennsylvanians.   Tomorrow Pennsylvanians will deliver on our promise to them and keep them in the White House for FOUR MORE YEARS! #PromisesMadePromisesKept https://t.co/wAUJ5PoZ39

Joe Biden's promise to create a government-run socialist health care system would sabotage Americans' progress on lifesaving cures.   Especially as we wage war against a pandemic our nation can’t afford to give up on the promise of America. https://t.co/bkN0JZ2cbX
It’s an awesome day to welcome @realDonaldTrump back to Blair County!!
The people of Pennsylvania are listening @JoeBiden. Whether you call us "deplorables" or "chumps" we're still going to deliver a victory for @realdonaldtrump. https://t.co/U6HCW6nKgq
Under President @realDonaldTrump’s leadership America is energy independent for the first time in my lifetime.  Pennsylvania simply can’t afford a repeat of the failed Obama-Biden energy agenda.

As @Mike_Pence said Joe Biden would be a cheerleader for China. President @realDonaldTrump and Republicans are standing up to the #CCP and bringing jobs home.  We want jobs in Somerset not Shanghai.  We want jobs in Bedford not Beijing.   We want jobs in Waynesboro not Wuhan.
We want @realdonaldtrump in the White House for FOUR MORE YEARS! https://t.co/pEtLrhoAM9
Looking forward to welcoming President @realDonaldTrump BACK to Johnstown tomorrow!! Western Pennsylvania is Trump Country. He's fighting for us - and we're fighting for him! https://t.co/Mvt9ERxUzZ
Excellent presentation by VP @Mike_Pence.   Under President @realDonaldTrump America is stronger safer and more secure. 🇺🇸 #VPDebate

If Pennsylvanians don’t trust Joe Biden’s approach to energy it’s because we’ve seen it all before.   We can’t afford the radical Biden-Harris agenda that would kill our jobs and repeat Obama’s failed energy record.  https://t.co/rvS8Bu8tC8

Under @realDonaldTrump’s leadership America is energy independent for the first time in my life. Rather than staying reliant on foreign nations today we are a net exporter of American-made energy.  Pennsylvania can’t afford Joe Biden’s energy agenda. https://t.co/rvS8Bu8tC8
The Senate must confirm Judge Amy Coney Barrett. #ConfirmACB
Awesome to welcome President @realDonaldTrump back to Pennsylvania tonight! 🇺🇸 https://t.co/0AiPXPNIEC
Welcome back to western Pennsylvania President @realDonaldTrump. We are behind your pro-life pro-jobs pro-growth agenda! #PromisesMadePromisesKept https://t.co/6uwGIknaF0

What an amazing night in PA-13! From protecting our energy jobs to cutting taxes for families and creating American jobs for American workers Pennsylvanians recognize #PromisesMadePromisesKept. We WILL re-elect @realDonaldTrump for four more years!! https://t.co/s2EpIqJNFn
Welcome back to #PA13 Mr. President! We all know it - Western Pennsylvania is Trump Country!! https://t.co/kL9THimICO
Our Pennsylvania energy industry - and the hardworking Pennsylvanians who power America - can’t afford Joe Biden’s job-killing agenda. https://t.co/DSJMu4vTjg
Hardworking Pennsylvanians power America. Joe Biden’s radical energy agenda would kill high-paying family-sustaining jobs here in our community. Clearly the Biden-Harris platform won’t work for us.

Looking forward to joining @RadioSaltzman at 6:30 for an update on the #RNCConvention. In Pennsylvania we know that President  @realDonaldTrump will protect our energy industry & jobs rebuild America’s economy and lead our nation on the path to recovery.

President @realDonaldTrump has made significant progress to improve Americans’ access to quality & affordable health care as well as to invest in lifesaving innovation. These are #PromisesMadePromisesKept for Pennsylvania families veterans and seniors. https://t.co/nuKqgY2oZ9

Great to be with @realDonaldTrump in PA yesterday! He is the right person to rebuild our economy and lead us on the road to recovery and Pennsylvanians are looking forward to delivering a strong victory for him this fall. https://t.co/f4dTjUbWno
Congratulations to my friend and fellow doctor @RogerMarshallMD on a great primary victory in Kansas! He’ll be a strong conservative voice in the Senate.
Welcome back to Pennsylvania Mr. Vice President! 🇺🇸   Thank you for supporting our brave police officers. https://t.co/7yBwyMHIIs
Happy birthday Mr. President! Thank you for your service and dedication to our nation @realDonaldTrump. 🇺🇸 https://t.co/BoOeFAfN3W
Welcome back to Pennsylvania Mr. Vice President! https://t.co/Rd9ajOuVVS

Thanks to all who voted and volunteered in the #PAprimary. I was proud to receive @realDonaldTrump's endorsement and to be part of his 64-0 winning record. Together we're going to keep protecting our conservative values and delivering on our promises to Americans in PA & beyond.
Thank you to everyone who voted and to our wonderful volunteers - I’m so grateful for your support. It’s my privilege to serve and fight for you. https://t.co/GZixzs2FQU

The stakes are high. All of us are facing a choice between freedom and socialism. Today I encourage you to make your voice heard and vote in the Pennsylvania Primary Election. #PAPrimary https://t.co/jpOvnH9U5Q

The Primary Election is on Tuesday June 2 and it’s up to all of us to support President @realDonaldTrump and Pennsylvania Republicans. 🇺🇸   Find your polling place and additional information at https://t.co/f1p87kIq6S.
Thank you Mr. President! It’s my privilege to serve. https://t.co/7dYQdkMiKZ
Congratulations Congressman-elect Garcia! Looking forward to working with you in the House. https://t.co/LgCNMDVcA9

The PA primary election on June 2 is fast approaching and I am humbly asking for your vote. In Congress I will continue fighting for you and for our commonsense conservative values.   It’s up to all of us to deliver a strong victory for @realDonaldTrump & PA Republicans. https://t.co/57feOgTFX8
Grateful for the #ProLife Americans who stand up for life. We know the truth - 47 years of Roe v. Wade is 47 years too long. #MarchForLife2020 #WhyWeMarch https://t.co/RCDZZTpgHb

Proud to join President @realDonaldTrump at the #MarchForLife2020 as we continue our fight to protect ALL human life. As we heard from President Trump “Every person is worth protecting.” #WhyWeMarch https://t.co/2bTWpDuKUp
